ABOUT.TITLE: About Me

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Experience
EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: Over 10 years of experience in providing psychological support and therapy to individuals, couples, and groups.

APPROACH.TITLE: My Approach
APPROACH.DESCRIPTION: I believe in creating a safe, non-judgmental space where you can explore your thoughts and feelings. My approach combines evidence-based techniques with personalized care.

EDUCATION.TITLE: Education & Certifications
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION: Licensed psychologist with a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology and continuous professional development through specialized training and certifications.
